title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C programming is a versatile, procedural language used for software development, known for its efficiency and low-level control over hardware.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems efficiently, fundamental in computer science, used in software development, data analysis, and more.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a versatile programming language integral in data structures and algorithms (DSA), combining object-oriented and procedural features for efficient coding.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, essential for organizing and manipulating data.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python emphasizes objects, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism, making it a versatile language for software design and development.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software engineering is a systematic approach to design, develop, test, maintain, and manage software systems, ensuring quality, reliability, and efficiency.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform providing scalable, on-demand computing resources, storage, and services globally.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is a popular open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) known for its speed, reliability, and wide application in web development.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-solving is a cognitive process involving analyzing, devising strategies, and implementing solutions to overcome challenges, essential in various fields.
